fr.playsoft.android.tools.operation

Class Operation

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.playsoft.android.tools.operation.Operation

  • public abstract class Operation
extends Object
    Abstract class for single, runnable operation.
    Author:
    Olgierd Uzieblo

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public final void start(Context pContext)
        Starts this operation.
        Parameters:
        pContext - Context that can be used during running.

      • run

        protected abstract boolean run(Context pContext)
        Runs this operation.
        Parameters:
        pContext - Context to use.
        Returns:
        True if Operation completed successfully, false otherwise.

      • getOperationResult

        protected abstract Object getOperationResult()
        Should return a result of this operation or null.
        Returns:
        Object containing result of this operation.

      • getOperationPriority

        protected abstract Integer getOperationPriority()
        Gets priority of this Operation. The higher the Priority the earlier it will be launched.
        Returns:
        Priority of this Operation.

      • setListener

        public final void setListener(IOperationResultListener pListener,
               Handler pHandler)
        Sets object interested in result of this Operation.
        Parameters:
        pListener - Listener to use.
        pHandler - Handler to use for posting results (should be created in UI thread).
